colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES GSHEG SOL BYA, GZHAN YANG BKRA SHIS CI RIGS BRJOD, RLUNG RTA GSO BA'I BSANGS GSOL MCHOD RLUNG RTA'I ME BAR BA'I RLUNG GA-YAB CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MTHO RIGS THOS PA BZANG SPYOD LDAN PA THO YON RAB BRTAN ZHES BGYIS 'DI LTAR DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DES BLO ZHI MING CAN KYANG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA BAG CHAGS BZHAG NAS BRIS PA SE MAS GE BAS PHYA MA SKYE PA MANG BOR SNA TSOGS THABS MKHAS KYIS 'GRO BA'I DON MDZAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
